name: Astral Hunters (NEW)
description:
Join the discord here: https://discord.gg/QrF3YV4CRd

Astral Hunters is a game in early alpha where you equip your character with two weapons, then jump into endless waves of enemies. When you kill enemies they might drop gems. Put these gems into a basket, and try to fill the quota each round!

All music in the game is produced by Adrian Ringstad, who is also the composer of games such as Workaholic, Demon Tail, and Braxton's Adventure

There will be updates further down the line
